series.name: Spartacus: House of Ashur
series.overview: In a world where he survived the events of Spartacus (2010), Ashur clawed his way to power, owning the same ludus that once owned him. Allying with a fierce gladiatrix, Ashur ignites a new kind of spectacle that offends the elite.

series.name: Pluribus
series.overview: The most miserable person on Earth must save the world from happiness.

series.name: The Abandons
series.overview: In 1850s Washington, two families led by powerful matriarchs — one wealthy, one poor but deeply loyal — battle for supremacy on the lawless frontier.

series.name: Heated Rivalry
series.overview: Two of the biggest stars in Major League Hockey are bound by ambition, rivalry, and a magnetic pull neither of them fully understands. What begins as a secret fling between two fresh faced rookies evolves into a years-long journey of love, denial, and self-discovery. Over the next eight years, as they chase glory on the ice, they struggle to navigate their feelings for each other. Torn between the sport they live for and the love they can’t ignore, they must decide if there’s room in their fiercely competitive world for something as fragile – and powerful – as real love.

series.name: Robin Hood
series.overview: A modern reimagining of the classic tale. After the Norman invasion of England, Rob, a Saxon forester’s son, and Marian, a Norman lord’s daughter, fall in love and unite to fight for justice, challenge corruption, and restore peace to the land.

series.name: Sean Combs: The Reckoning
series.overview: This documentary series unpacks the shocking allegations behind Sean "Diddy" Combs and his Bad Boy empire, spanning decades of his life and career.

series.name: The Beast in Me
series.overview: A famous author is pulled into a twisted mind game with her rich, powerful new neighbor — who might be a murderer.

series.name: The Mighty Nein
series.overview: When a powerful arcane relic known as 'The Beacon' falls into nefarious hands, a group of fugitives and outcasts, bound by secrets and scars, must learn to work together to save the realm and stop reality as they know it from unraveling.

series.name: Summerwater
series.overview: Set against the backdrop of a remote loch-side Scottish holiday cabin park and set over the course of one single rainy summer’s day, Summerwater looks at the simmering tensions between holidaymakers that eventually erupt into a devastating climax.

series.name: All Her Fault
series.overview: In Chicago, Marissa Irvine arrives at 14 Arthur Avenue, expecting to pick up her young son Milo from his first playdate with a boy at his new school. But the woman who answers the door isn't a mother she recognizes. She isn't the nanny. She doesn't have Milo. And so begins every parent's worst nightmare.

series.name: Down Cemetery Road
series.overview: When a child goes missing in the aftermath of a house explosion, a concerned neighbor teams up with a private investigator to find them. As secrets unravel and a military conspiracy emerges, all hell is unleashed on South Oxford's sleepy suburbs.

series.name: Fortnite x The Simpsons
series.overview: Springfield and Fortnite universes converge. Chaos ensues as Homer sets out to transform the world, wielding a powerful alien energy.

series.name: All's Fair
series.overview: A team of female divorce attorneys leave a male-dominated firm to open their own powerhouse practice. Fierce, brilliant, and emotionally complicated, they navigate high-stakes breakups, scandalous secrets, and shifting allegiances—both in the courtroom and within their own ranks. In a world where money talks and love is a battleground, these women don't just play the game—they change it.

series.name: Bad Influencer
series.overview: A single mother — and luxury bag counterfeiter — finds herself teaming up with a self-obsessed influencer to sell her bags and scrape her way out of debt.

series.name: Malice
series.overview: A charming tutor infiltrates a wealthy family's life, revealing a sinister agenda.

series.name: Death by Lightning
series.overview: The story of James Garfield, who rose from obscurity to become America's 20th President — and Charles Guiteau, the man who assassinated him.

series.name: The Bad Guys: Breaking In
series.overview: How did the Bad Guys break into the bad guy business in the first place? Find out in this hilarious prequel series set before the hit films.

series.name: Ripple
series.overview: In New York City, four strangers navigate life's challenges while their separate paths unexpectedly intertwine in ways that change them forever.

series.name: The War Between the Land and the Sea
series.original_name: The War Between the Land and the Sea
series.overview: When a fearsome and ancient species emerges from the ocean, dramatically revealing themselves to humanity, an international crisis is triggered. With the entire population at risk, UNIT step into action as the land and sea wage war.

series.name: I Love LA
series.overview: A codependent friend group navigates life and love in Los Angeles. With aspirations of becoming a talent manager, Maia is stalled out as an assistant while living with her boyfriend...until her longtime best friend and frenzied influencer Tallulah returns.

series.name: BAT-FAM
series.overview: Follow Batman, Alfred, and young Damian Wayne—who has taken on the mantle of Little Batman—alongside a few newcomers to Wayne Manor, as they navigate the fun and frustrations of life as a super family

series.name: The American Revolution
series.overview: The American Revolution was at once a war for independence, a war of conquest, a civil war, and a world war, fought by neighbors on American farms and between global powers an ocean or more away. It impacted millions from Vermont’s Green Mountains to the swamps of South Carolina, from Indian Country to the Iberian Peninsula. In defeating the British Empire and giving birth to a new nation, the American Revolution turned the world upside-down. Thirteen colonies on the Atlantic Coast united in rebellion, won their independence, and established a republic that still endures. The American Revolution will present the story of the men and women of the Revolutionary generation, their humanity in victory and defeat, and the crisis that they lived through.

series.name: Twelve Dates 'Til Christmas
series.overview: Follows Saville Row textile pattern designer Kate, who lives in the quaint village of Blexford, England next door to her father Mac, who is long-divorced from Kate’s mother Delilah, a globe-trotting American always on an adventure.  When not at work, Kate looks after Mac, who’s recovering from a motorbike accident and is inclined to spend his days sitting in his recliner.  Her best friend Laura signs her up for The 12 Dates of Christmas – a holiday-themed matchmaking program in the days leading up to the holiday featuring carefully curated, yuletide dating experiences, in an attempt to get Kate out of her rut.

series.name: Cooper & Fry
series.overview: Set in the mystery-shrouded Peak District, the series follows two mismatched young detectives: affable local Ben Cooper and guarded newcomer Diane Fry. Thrown together to investigate a string of mysterious deaths they must learn to work together to get results. As their personal lives begin to intertwine, a unique friendship begins to form... but it won't always be easy.

series.name: The Nowhere Man
series.overview: Lukas, a former mercenary haunted by PTSD, roams the city as a waste picker with his trolley. At the homeless shelter where he lives, he salvages scraps to help others. Using his metalworking skill, he crafts statues and sells them to raise funds, quietly battling the violent past he longs to escape.

series.name: LEGO Marvel Avengers: Strange Tails
series.overview: Hawkeye and The Avengers have made saving the world look easy. But now they face their wildest threat yet: SOCIAL MEDIA. To save the world, a new team must be recruited to help our heroes contend with an influencer bent on cataclysmic destruction.

series.name: Fire and Water: Making the Avatar Films
series.original_name: Fire and Water: Making the Avatar Films
series.overview: This two-part documentary provides a fascinating glimpse into the making of the Oscar-winning box office phenomenon "Avatar: The Way of Water" and features exclusive behind-the-scenes footage, concept art, and interviews with cast and filmmakers.

series.name: The Death of Bunny Munro
series.overview: Travelling salesman Bunny Munro takes his son around Sussex following the death of his wife Libby. And while Bunny’s grief and his addictions threaten to derail their road trip entirely, a serial killer dressed as the devil makes his own way down to Brighton.

series.name: Son of a Donkey
series.overview: Theo comes up with chaotic schemes to save his impounded car. Meanwhile, his dying dad will stop at nothing to find himself a new kidney.

series.name: Still Waters
series.overview: In 1995, activist Llyr dies in a bombing; his cousin Rhys is jailed for his murder. In 2025, Rhys returns to buried secrets in a gripping tale of protest, guilt, and generational reckoning. Starring Mark Lewis Jones and Sian Resse-Williams.

series.name: Baddies USA
series.overview:
Baddies USA kicks off in DC with a reunion of OG

Bad Girls and a Ballroom Dinner.

series.name: The Artist
series.overview: In the Gilded Age, an ensemble of the era’s celebrities including Thomas Edison, Edgar Degas and Evelyn Nesbit meet at the home of an eccentric and failing tycoon. By the end of the night, the mogul is found dead, spurring a historical fiction-themed murder mystery.

series.name: Stumble
series.overview: Courteney Potter is determined to rally her newly recruited junior college cheer squad to win her record-breaking 15th championship and improve their lives along the way.

series.name: Crutch
series.overview: Francois 'Frank' Crutchfield or 'Crutch' to those who know him well, is a Harlem widower whose empty-nest plans are put on hold after his millennial son and free-spirited daughter move back home.

series.name: Trespasses
series.overview: When young Catholic teacher Cushla falls for a married Protestant man, their secret passion ignites a dangerous love that defies the Troubles divide.

series.name: MARINES
series.overview: Follows the 31st Marine Expeditionary Unit as they conduct high-stakes combat exercises in the Pacific.

series.name: Ghosts Australia
series.overview: New lovebirds Kate and Sean are about to jump into the hellscape that is the inner-city rental market, until Kate inherits a huge mansion in the country. Moving in together for the first time the young couple are attempting domestic bliss, but unbeknown to them, the house is haunted by a collection of needy spirits who carked it in Ramshead Manor over the past 200 years.

series.name: Kingdom
series.overview: Filmed across five years in a single spectacular location, the lives and fates of our four families - leopards, hyenas, wild dogs, and lions - are inextricably linked as they strive for a foothold in a remote and fertile river valley in Zambia.

series.name: The Borderline
series.overview: A border town cop uncovers an illegal drug trade tied to his childhood friend and a ruthless British crime syndicate operating in the scenic 1000 Islands region between Canada and the U.S.

series.name: Wild Cherry
series.overview: Two pampered teenage daughters. Two very different mothers. The rich life is easy – until a shocking scandal reveals toxic secrets and the ugly side of glamour.

series.name: Girls Raised In the South
series.overview: Follows Keisha, Ty and Francis, three young women from the unforgiving city of Memphis who are determined to figure out the next chapter in their lives while relishing in the world of their favorite past time, roller skating.

series.name: Next Level Baker
series.overview: Talented bakers compete through three challenging rounds, crafting spectacular seasonal treats. Only one will emerge victorious and be crowned the ultimate holiday champion.

series.name: My Nightmare Stalker: The Eva LaRue Story
series.original_name: My Nightmare Stalker: The Eva LaRue Story
series.overview: The harrowing true story of how actress Eva LaRue and her daughter Kaya endured 12 years of terror at the hands of a relentless stalker. Operating from the shadows, he taunted and terrorized their lives while his identity remained a mystery, even to the FBI. In this gripping account, Eva reveals the constant fear, emotional toll, and the resolve, courage and resilience it took to protect her family.

series.name: Civilisations: Rise and Fall
series.overview: Four mighty civilisations - Rome, Egypt, Japan's Samurai and the Aztecs. Their legends remain - now priceless artefacts reveal what led them to fall into the echoes of history.

series.name: Safehaven
series.overview: Safehaven follows Jenna Frost, a fierce, complicated high school comic book artist who must fight to uncover hidden truths after horrifying visions from her drawings come to life-threatening everyone around her. John Rayburn, the mysterious new school counselor determined to save her, even if it endangers both of their lives, and unearths his own personal demons. Complicating matters is Will, a passionate young man committed to protecting Jenna, who finds herself torn between rejecting his help and her growing feelings for him.

series.name: Words + Music
series.overview: Iconic artists share stories about songs pivotal to their careers, followed by all-new performances of those songs either solo or with a band. As the artists' stories unfold, the environment around them transforms to reflect each anecdote and song, creating an intimate yet visually stunning experience.

series.name: He Had It Coming
series.overview: An awkward scholarship student and a social media influencer vandalize a university statue in protest. The next morning, they discover a murdered athlete at its base and must clear their names while finding the real killer.

series.name: The Sycamore Gap Mystery
series.overview: When the beloved 200-year-old Sycamore Gap tree on Hadrian’s Wall is mysteriously felled overnight, public outrage erupts worldwide. This gripping two-part true-crime documentary follows Northumbria Police’s unprecedented investigation, with exclusive access to detectives, witnesses and never-before-seen evidence. As officers untangle a bizarre case with no CCTV and no witnesses, the series explores the cultural impact of the tree’s loss and the global fight for justice in one of the UK’s most unusual environmental crimes.

series.name: Alex vs ARod
series.overview: From the pinnacle of athletic success to the depths of scandal, Alex Rodriguez saw his prolific baseball career marred by a high-profile suspension for performance-enhancing drug use. Told through a series of intimate interviews with Rodriguez, explore the dualities of one of the most polarizing figures in sports.

series.name: Koati
series.overview: Four adorable rainforest animals and their fearless friends go on adventures, learn about nature and discover the power of friendship together.

series.name: Eyes In The Woods
series.overview: The forest watches as two sisters confront personal truths - and what lurks in the dark.

series.name: 5-Star
series.overview: As these athletes chase their dreams under the spotlight, they must learn how to navigate playing in the Big Ten Conference while growing up in a pressure-cooker environment. When every mistake can risk everything and the fall from grace is devastatingly real, this isn't just about competing anymore; it's about fighting for a future where glory is within reach.

series.name: Prisoner 951
series.overview: The true story of Nazanin Zaghari-Ratcliffe - imprisoned in Iran and separated from her daughter - and her husband Richard, who fights both the British and Iranian governments to facilitate her release.

series.name: Good Sports with Kevin Hart and Kenan Thompson
series.original_name: Good Sports with Kevin Hart and Kenan Thompson
series.overview: Kevin Hart and Kenan Thompson break down their favorite moments from the NFL, NBA and the wide, weird world of sports with colorful commentary on highlights, sketches, celebrity and athlete interviews.

series.name: Toronto Airport Uncovered
series.overview: Behind-the-scenes look at Toronto Pearson Airport shows how Canada's busiest hub manages millions of passengers and aircraft through snowstorms, tech problems, emergencies, and security issues.

series.name: James May's Shed Load of Ideas
series.original_name: James May's Shed Load of Ideas
series.overview: In "James May's Shed Load of Ideas," the beloved presenter fully leans into his persona as a modern-day, pragmatic philosopher. Freed from the world of high-octane automotive challenges, May returns to his natural habitat: a wonderfully cluttered shed. From this cozy HQ, he embarks on a series of intellectual and practical explorations, applying his signature curiosity and dry wit to everything from the history of mundane objects to grand futuristic concepts. The show is a testament to the fact that the subject is almost irrelevant; the true appeal is simply listening to James May think aloud. It's a comforting, witty, and deeply engaging series for anyone who finds joy in the art of thoughtful inquiry.

series.name: Wicked: The Official Podcast
series.overview:
Welcome to the official Wicked podcast! Consider this your all-access pass to the land of Oz. Presented by Universal Pictures and Vanity Fair, and hosted by Chris Murphy, this series features intimate conversations with Cynthia Erivo, Ariana Grande, and the cast – along with Director Jon M. Chu and the visionary creative team that brought this beloved story to life.

Over eight weeks, we’ll pull back the emerald curtain to uncover the secrets of making Wicked – from building the massive sets and recording the iconic songs, to crafting the dazzling costumes, makeup, and visual language that reimagined Oz for a new generation, all while tackling the challenge of filming two movies at once.

Following the release of Wicked: For Good on November 21, we’ll travel even further down the yellow brick road to explore story changes, performances, Easter eggs, and the creative evolution that makes these films one of cinema’s most spellbinding productions.

series.name: Yellow
series.overview: It follows two fugitives who steal a taxi to escape from the police.

series.name: The Rocky Mountain Mortician Murder
series.overview: Explores the murder of Byron Griffy, a respected mortician, who was found dead on his remote ranch, shot execution-style.

series.name: June Farms
series.overview: Matt Baumgartner, owner of June Farms, wants to make it the premier event space in the Hudson Valley. He has his hands full every week delivering perfect bespoke weddings. With a staff of fun-loving twenty-somethings, at times more focused on their love lives than their jobs and inclement weather, this wedding season turned out to be the hardest one in June Farm’s history.

series.name: Safe Space
series.overview: An underqualified Dr. Fredericks does his best to help and therapize struggling couples back to a so-called “safe space.”

series.name: Gifted
series.overview: Set in the breathtaking city of Edinburgh, a diverse group of young Scottish teens discover they each have unique superpowers, from telekinesis to invisibility and mind reading.

series.name: Jimmy Carr's Am I The A**hole?
series.original_name: Jimmy Carr's Am I The A**hole?
series.overview: Each episode sees Jimmy Carr, Jamali Maddix and GK Barry dive into a series of jaw dropping admissions, shocking family fallouts, and moments of pure social chaos, as they ask the all important question: Is this person really an A**hole?

series.name: SUMPAH IBUKU
series.overview: Husna, a resilient single mother, remarries her old love, Hadith, but faces rejection and tyranny from her mother-in-law, Che Yam. In cahoots with Hadith's younger sister, Syafiqah, Che Yam uses sorcery and slander to destroy Husna's life. Despite being persecuted, Husna remains loyal and lovingly cares for her paralyzed father-in-law. As the slander escalates, Hadith begins to doubt her loyalty, forcing Husna to leave. With the support of her friends and Nurul Iman, Husna rises again — and the truth about Che Yam and Syafiqah's evil plans is finally revealed.

series.name: Don't Date Brandon
series.overview: Follow a modern romance that spiraled into a dangerous game of deception. When Amber starts dating Brandon after meeting him online, he seems like the perfect boyfriend. But when she connects with his ex-wife, Athena, everything is turned upside-down as they learn the truth together: Brandon is a manipulative liar with dark secrets.

series.name: Mark Rober's CrunchLabs
series.overview: At CrunchLabs, Mark Rober transforms wild ideas into reality, blending engineering and outrageous fun for science adventures you'll never forget.

series.name: Surviving Mormonism with Heather Gay
series.overview: Heather Gay explores the secrets and sins behind the Mormon church, fracturing the church's seemingly perfect veneer to expose the secrets that have been kept behind closed doors. Heather has impactful conversations with abuse survivors, ex-Mormons and former LDS church leaders.

series.name: Empire with David Olusoga
series.overview: How did a small island once rule over a quarter of the world's population? This shared history still shapes us today - and billions of people are part of its story.

series.name: Scav
series.overview: Every year, a 20-page Scavenger Hunt list plunges the University of Chicago into fun, sleepless chaos. This series will bring the audience into the action, following three top teams as they race to complete the list, and answering the question of what happens when the best and brightest turn their focus towards the silliest things you’ve ever seen.

series.name: CryptoKnights
series.overview: CryptoKnights is a groundbreaking reality show that merges the dynamic world of cryptocurrency with mainstream media. It brings together some of the most influential figures in Web3 to evaluate and invest in promising crypto projects.

series.name: The Marvellous Miniature Workshop
series.overview: It's the little things that mean the most. Sara Cox and a team of magnificent makers bring cherished memories back to life. The models may be tiny, but the joy they bring is huge.

series.name: Reckless
series.overview: When feuding siblings June and Charlie cover up a hit and run in their hometown of Fremantle, their lives spiral wildly out of control. As the lies pile up, so do the consequences and soon, everyone in town has something to lose.

series.name: Bullseye
series.overview: Join Freddie Flintoff and official scorer 'Little' Richard Ashdown as the iconic gameshow returns. Knowers and throwers, who's got their eyes on the prize?!

series.name: Crime Night!
series.overview: Host Julia Zemiro and an expert team of criminologists and comedians dive beneath the surface of crime to discover the science and psychology behind it all.

series.name: Hitler's DNA: Blueprint of a Dictator
series.original_name: Hitler's DNA: Blueprint of a Dictator
series.overview: For the first time ever, experts identify Hitler’s DNA. What do his genes reveal about Hitler's heritage and origins, his neurology and drives?

series.name: Doménica Montero
series.overview: A respected and renowned businesswoman and philanthropist, considered one of the most sought-after brides in the country, who is left at the altar on her wedding day. Humiliated, betrayed, and turned into a target of public scrutiny, Doménica decides to flee and take refuge in one of her parents’ old estates. There, marked by pain, she faces new challenges and meets Luis Fernando, the owner of the neighboring estate, who also carries a painful past. Between them, an explosive relationship develops, marked by pride, misunderstandings, and growing attraction, where land disputes intertwine with their shared desire to rebuild, heal, and give new meaning to their lives.

series.name: What's the Monarchy For?
series.overview: David Dimbleby examines the power, wealth and survival of the institution at the heart of our national life: the monarchy.

series.name: Spilling Your Seed
series.overview: Join Chloe Troast as she uncovers the surprising ancestral roots of celebrities and comedians. Each episode reveals shocking connections, hidden histories, and heartfelt discoveries — all through the lens of expert genetic analysis and historical sleuthing. From legendary bloodlines to long-buried family secrets, this is where the past meets personality.

series.name: FAME/LESS
series.overview: FAME/LESS follows musician Robert Hunter and his wife Becky on a 50-state, 52-week tour inspired by her cancer battle. Living in an RV, they chase fame while confronting love, loss, and the harsh realities of life on the road.

series.name: Caroline Flack: Search for the Truth
series.original_name: Caroline Flack: Search for the Truth
series.overview: Follow Caroline's mother, Christine, as she investigates the truth about her daughter's final months - uncovering new shocking details, asking difficult questions, and exposing the misrepresentations, pressures, and failures from institutions and decision makers that shaped Caroline's final days.

series.name: Sandi's Great Riviera Rail Trip
series.overview: Sandi Toksvig embarks on one of the world's grandest most spectacular rail trips, along the French Riviera: the playground of the rich and famous.

series.name: Game of Wool: Britain's Best Knitter
series.original_name: Game of Wool: Britain's Best Knitter
series.overview: Tom Daley hosts as amateur knitters knock needles to impress judges Di Gilpin and Shelia Greenwell. Who can stitch without a glitch to become the UK’s first TV knitting champion?

series.name: Mary at 90: A Lifetime of Cooking
series.original_name: Mary at 90: A Lifetime of Cooking
series.overview: Happy birthday! Mary Berry is joined by famous friends to share memories and recipes. Celebrating the joy of food, they'll revisit old favourites and discover new delicious dishes.

series.name: Portrait Artist Of The Year
series.overview: Hosted by award winning actor Miranda Tapsell and beloved comedian Luke McGregor, this captivating eight-part art competition series explores one of the most accessible and provocative forms of art - the portrait.

series.name: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
series.original_name: The Infinite Explorer with Hannah Fry
series.overview: Professor Hannah Fry sets off on a global adventure, not just to see the world but to decode it. With curiosity, wit and insight she peels back the layers in six iconic locations: Spain, Vietnam, Greece, South Korea, Ireland, and Iceland. Through stunning landscapes, vibrant cities and off the beaten track treasures, Hannah seeks out extraordinary local voices and unexpected quirks of history and geography that reveal what makes each place truly unique. Always seeking patterns and hidden connections, she uncovers how Spain’s destiny was shaped by mountains, analyses traffic etiquette in Ho Chi Minh City, reveals secrets hidden in the geometry at the Parthenon and how Irish syntax builds a world view. This is much more than a travelogue—it’s a journey into the forces that shape nations and define cultures.

series.name: Who Hired the Hitman?
series.overview: The mystery isn’t who pulls the trigger, but who pulls the strings. In these twisted whodunit investigations, solid alibis and crime scene forensics mean nothing when detectives are on the hunt for an evil mastermind.

series.name: Tiffany Haddish Goes Off
series.overview: Comedian and actress Tiffany Haddish journeys to Africa on a four-week-long girls trip with her three closest childhood friends Selena Martin, Shermona Long, Sparkle Clark. Throughout the trip they take on new adventures, deepen their lifelong friendship, and explore personal connections to the continent.

series.name: Sandi Toksvig's Hidden Wonders
series.overview: Sandi Toksvig and Raksha Dave join some of the nation’s most extraordinary digs, as they explore remarkable sites on the brink of great discoveries and unearth hidden secrets from Britain's past.

series.name: Baked With Love: Holiday
series.overview: 10 talented pairs of home bakers face off in a warm-hearted, family- recipe bake-off. They will infuse their heritage, personal stories, and cherished family recipes into classic bakes with a holiday twist and serve their dishes to a panel of expert judges.

series.name: Three Months to Break Your Heart
series.original_name: Three Months to Break Your Heart
series.overview: Two years ago, Summer sold her liver to a tycoon for 30 billion to save her bankrupt husband, Will. She forced him to divorce her. Now, with liver failure and only three months to live, she works tirelessly to fund her sister's surgery.

series.name: When The War Is Over
series.overview: Rachel Griffiths puts the power of art to the ultimate test, one artwork and one war at a time.

series.name: Quokka's Wild Life
series.overview: Join a family of animal documentarians as they journey through nature to capture incredible wildlife stories. At the center is Quokka, their adopted daughter whose creativity and curiosity bring fresh perspective to every adventure. As they face challenges and discoveries together, the family grows closer—learning lessons of selflessness, gratitude, and connection.

series.name: The Assembly
series.overview: A group of autistic and neurodivergent interviewers asks unpredictable, probing and direct questions to celebrities in a no holds barred interview.

series.name: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
series.original_name: Behind Bars: Sex, Bribes and Murder
series.overview: An investigation into a viral prison sex tape leads journalist Mobeen Azhar to discover an illicit prison economy fuelled by inappropriate relationships, coercion and contraband.

series.name: The Real Housewives Ultimate Girls Trip: Africa
series.original_name: The Real Housewives Ultimate Girls Trip: Africa
series.overview: For the first time, we’re bringing together iconic Housewives from across the continent to share their worlds, their stories and their sisterhood. It’s unapologetically Pan-African, women-led and full of the energy and authenticity that make Africa unlike anywhere else on Earth.

series.name: Tournament of Champions: All-Star Christmas
series.overview: Guy Fieri is combining everyone's favorite culinary competition with the most wonderful time of the year by delivering the ultimate holiday present — Tournament of Champions: All-Star Christmas. For the first time ever, 32 jingle-bell-rock-star chefs are teaming up as duos to make both sweet and savory dishes in a one-of-a-kind, holly-jolly tournament. These chefs will try to "sleigh" the competition for a shot at the $100,000 prize and some seriously sweet cash for charity. With festive flavors, fierce battles and enough Christmas spirit to stuff a stocking, the holidays have never been this delicious

series.name: Gingerbread Land: The Biggest Little Holiday Competition
series.original_name: Gingerbread Land: The Biggest Little Holiday Competition
series.overview: Top bakers compete in gingerbread building challenges, creating edible miniature worlds with lights, motion, and intricate details. Teams face weekly tests of design, structure, and creativity in this festive holiday competition.

series.name: High Horse: The Black Cowboy
series.overview: Three-part pop culture and historical documentary confronts and reclaims the Wild West while revealing the story of the Black cowboy — a history that has largely been untold.

series.name: Shiftless
series.overview: Paul and Steve end up in bizarre situations.

series.name: Dino Ranch: Island Explorers
series.overview: Join Jon, Min, Miguel and their trusty dinos, as they explore the Island's dino filled jungle, active volcano, and the previously undiscovered world under the water.

series.name: Once Upon a Time in Space
series.original_name: Once Upon a Time in Space
series.overview: The human story of space exploration using unique, unexpected archive, present-day footage and first-hand testimony from around the world. This series will connect the past with the present and examine what the consequences are for the future of humankind as we once again head into space.

series.name: 'Til You Make It
series.overview: Meet Mei and Tim: two middle-aged actors still waiting for their “big break.” Tim’s made peace teaching others to shine — but Mei? She’s not done dreaming just yet.

series.name: Original Gangsters with Sean Bean
series.overview: From Al Capone, to the real Peaky Blinders, from The Krays twins to the Queen of Harlem, each hour-long episode of Original Gangsters will see the legendary actor Sean Bean take a deep dive through a rogues gallery of some of the most notorious criminals in history to separate the fact from the fiction, as we find out what they mean to us today and just why they were the original gangsters.

series.name: No Strings Attached
series.overview: Real celebrities. Really saucy stories. Mel Giedroyc hosts the erotic showbiz book club where famous guests narrate racy fanfiction while naughty puppets bring their words vividly to life!

series.name: Dexter Procter
series.overview: A 10-year-old prodigy works as a paediatrician, tackling bizarre medical cases while dealing with a resentful senior doctor who's determined to end his career.

series.name: Sweet Empire
series.overview: Welcome to Sweet Empire, hosted by Wells Adams where bakers hold the power to build their teams, shape their vision and rise to sweet supremacy … or crumble in defeat. Each episode, competitors craft jaw-dropping desserts and showstopping masterpieces inspired by holiday traditions, pop culture and pure imagination. Judged by Yolanda Gampp and Jacques Torres, only the most daring creations will stand tall. At stake: $50,000 and the title of Sweet Empire.

series.name: Inside the World's Most Luxurious...
series.overview: An all-access pass to decadence and adventure, taking us aboard some of the world's most opulent movable feasts - from cruise liners with enviable art collections, to million-pound motorhomes.

series.name: Tales From Woodcreek
series.overview: Deborah Ann Woll leads an incredible cast through spooky mysteries and unscripted surprises in a completely unique D&D actual-play adventure.

series.name: Robson Green: World's Most Amazing Walks
series.original_name: Robson Green: World's Most Amazing Walks
series.overview: Robson Green embarks on a series of unforgettable adventures along some of the world's most awe-inspiring trails.

series.name: Play for Today
series.overview: Revival of the 1970s and 80s series of individual plays, originally shown on the BBC, now freshly-commissioned for Channel 5 and a whole new era of life in Britain.

series.name: About Face
series.overview: Elite surgeons in Los Angeles tackle some of the most complex facial reconstruction cases, helping patients with severe deformities and rare conditions reclaim dignity, hope, and a chance at a new life.

series.name: Greatest Basslines
series.overview: Series celebrating music's killer basslines and the glory of the bottom end. With A-List musical talent at its heart, each episode is authored by a different bass expert, offering three unique perspectives of experience and expertise and allowing the series to traverse through multiple genres: rock, funk, disco & hip hop and reggae & club culture.

series.name: Killer Grannies
series.overview: Killer Grannies is a true-crime documentary series on Oxygen True Crime that profiles shocking real-life cases where grandmothers turn into cold-blooded killers. Hosted by June Squibb, each self-contained episode follows investigators as they unravel the sinister plots and dark deeds of a seemingly innocent, maternal matriarch of a family.

series.name: Vantara: Santuary Stories
series.overview: Hosted by renowned wildlife biologist, conservationist, and adventurer Forrest Galante, the six-episode series will take audiences on a visually stunning journey into Vantara, the world's largest wildlife rescue and rehabilitation facility that offers lifelong care for some of the most magnificent animals on Earth. Located in Gujarat, India, Vantara is a closed-to-the-public sanctuary designed for the wellbeing of the animals who live there. It is home to over one million animals, representing over 1000 species and is operated by a dedicated team of 25,000 employees. Now, for the first time ever, Galante offers an unprecedented look inside the walls of this extraordinary, not-for-profit sanctuary - a world very few have ever been allowed to enter.

series.name: Shane Delia’s Malta
series.overview: Chef Shane Delia showcases the vibrant archipelago of Malta, a Mediterranean crossroads where cuisine and culture collide. He meets Maltese locals and puts his spin on local and family recipes.

series.name: Bill Bailey’s Vietnam
series.overview: Bill Bailey travels to Vietnam on the 50th anniversary of the withdrawal of US forces from Saigon. Immersing himself in its rich culture, stunning landscapes and complex history, he uncovers what makes this fascinating country tick.

series.name: Hoarding for the Holidays
series.overview: Step inside the glittering traditions of extreme holiday decorators and festive collectors. From couples divided over decor overload to families juggling joy with storage, see the outrageous world of those whose passion for the season knows no bounds.

series.name: Heathens
series.overview: HEATHENS is an action dark fantasy indie animation series about demons, devotion, and an era coming to an end. As Hell rumbles with the threat of an infernal war, follow a crew of 3 ride-or-die demonic friends as they navigate the underworld - chasing meaning through a whirlwind of bounties, brawls, and high-stakes heists.

series.name: Annabel Crabb's Civic Duty
series.overview: This 3-part docuseries tells the remarkable story of Australia's democratic system. Annabel Crabb unearths the individuals and stories behind the features that combine to make Australian democracy globally unique.

series.name: I Kissed a Boy Norway
series.overview: Brave, single men move into a luxurious estate in beautiful southern Italy – in search of true love! But there's no time to wait: The first time they meet, they have to kiss. The result is a celebration of queer love and an honest, emotional experience. Can a single kiss be the start of a relationship that lasts a lifetime?

series.name: The Great Escapers
series.overview: The nation’s best-known faces buddy up for the ultimate holiday. Follow their travels to stunning European destinations, as they compete to win the most memorable trip!

series.name: Secrets of the Royals: Births, Marriages and Deaths
series.original_name: Secrets of the Royals: Births, Marriages and Deaths
series.overview: Royal Births, Marriages, and Death is a captivating new ten-part documentary series featuring a dynamic and fresh cast of contributors with specialist expertise, extraordinary archive, ancient documents that reveal incredible insight. This stunning new series tells the story of a thousand years of monarchy through these powerful and pivotal moments.

series.name: Girlbands Forever
series.overview: Girl power and killer harmonies. Stars from All Saints, Mis-Teeq and more take a trip through the highs and lows of 90s pop and beyond - from adoration to the flip side of fame.

series.name: The Sneaker Boom
series.overview: Explores how young NBA stars and marketing execs drove an explosion in global popularity in sneakers in the 1990s.

series.name: Detective Naveed
series.overview: Disgraced ex-cop Naveed starts a private eye firm, then searches for his missing ex-wife and children across continents, facing personal demons along the way.

series.name: Inside the Arrest
series.overview:
Inside the Arrest captures the moment of arrest, conducted more than two thousand times a day by British police, in order to investigate or prevent a crime. The arrest is the start point for every story, a high-stakes moment that can be met with anything from violence to defiance, confession to incredulity.

Each episode features two cases using police bodycam footage to analyse some notorious and high-profile arrests from recent years.

series.name: The Hook-Up
series.overview: A group of young adults fueled with "big dreams" of being famous relying on their talents to remove them from their situation and personal demons.

series.name: Dunkman
series.overview: 40 of the best dunkers in the world compete to claim the $200K and title of DUNKMAN.

series.name: Shed and Buried: Classic Combine
series.overview: Henry Cole and the team restore a 1950s Massey Ferguson combine, racing to tame the beast and bring in the harvest; laughs, setbacks, and classic Shed & Buried spirit throughout.

series.name: Planet C: Home Race
series.overview: Planet C: Home Race tells the story of the boys from Planet C who dream of debuting as global idols. They return to the launch pad and embark on a new journey with Star Creators from around the world.

series.name: Holiday Bakeshop
series.overview: Holiday Bakeshop is a festively fun baking showdown where eight talented bakers face off in a high-stakes competition for a chance to take home $25,000. Hosted by actress and comedian Lauren Ash, each episode tests the bakers' creativity and technical skills as they race against the clock to complete two Holiday-themed bakes. Week after week the stakes are raised, and the bakers must impress the judges or face elimination. Lauren is joined on the judging panel by celebrated Filipino-Canadian chef, restaurateur, and TV personality Jordan Andino, and James Beard nominated chef, baking entrepreneur, and TV personality, Kareem “Mr. Bake” Queeman. Come the thrilling finale, three bakers will battle it out but only one will taste sweet victory, earning the title of Holiday Bakeshop champion and the cash prize.

series.name: The Man in the Mask: An Orkney Murder
series.original_name: The Man in the Mask: An Orkney Murder
series.overview: Full of jaw-dropping twists, this is the extraordinary story of the first murder in Orkney for 25 years as the police suspect a schoolboy of shooting dead a waiter in a restaurant.

series.name: Angus Ashworth: Yorkshire Heritage Hero
series.overview: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth embarks on a mission to help save Yorkshire's stately homes. Using his skills as a valuer and house clearance specialist, he unearths forgotten relics that can be sold at auction to help fund repairs and restoration work.

series.name: Sydney's Killer Cop
series.overview: On February 18th, 2024, something deep inside the psyche of Beau Lamarre-Condon – a policeman, celebrity stalker and blogger – snapped. Lamarre-Condon’s ex Jessie Baird, a TV presenter, and Luke Davies were both shot dead with a police-issue revolver that night. How did a trusted member of the police force become a cold-blooded murderer? How was Lamarre-Condon caught…and, tragically, where had he hidden the bodies of the two young men? Over two episodes a harrowing story unfolds around the famous Sydney gay scene, a policeman who flirted as a celebrity spotter, and how his delusional star-spotting would disintegrate around him into a deadly horror show.

series.name: Action Movie Mayhem
series.overview:
Byron Gibson returns to Thailand, the birthplace of his movie career, to launch the documentary series Action Movie Mayhem. In this explosive debut, Gibson interviews top stunt and action performers, giving audiences rare access to life behind the scenes. More than just high-octane stunts, the series dives into the personal worlds of these artists—their quirks, ambitions, hopes, and challenges.

The first episode, “Bangkok’s Dangerous,” features handpicked performers whose résumés collectively span over 300 films. From sharing the secrets of becoming a convincing screen villain to revealing how to break into the fiercely competitive film industry, the series pulls no punches. Set in Bangkok, a global hub for blockbusters like The Hangover Part II, The Alien TV Series, and The Meg 2, the show promises heart-pounding thrills, jaw-dropping stories, and an authentic look at the unsung heroes of action cinema.

series.name: Baby Shu and Fwends
series.overview: An anthology series featuring stories that explore friendship, power, and identity through the experiences of a rebellious teenager.

series.name: Murder on Trial
series.overview: Detectives chase leads, prosecutors face defense attorneys, and juries wrestle with decisions.

series.name: Anandalahari
series.overview: Two families from East and West Godavari collide in a hilarious journey filled with cultural clashes, romance, and domestic mayhem as traditions and modern life intertwine along the banks of India's great river.

series.name: Pitch Please
series.overview: A show where business meets comedy, startup pitches meets banter, information meets entertainment.

series.name: Clinical Foundations in Gottman Method Couples Therapy
series.original_name: Clinical Foundations in Gottman Method Couples Therapy
series.overview: Join the thousands of clinicians worldwide who have completed Level 1 and 2 Training in Gottman Method Couples Therapy.

series.name: Slay Queens
series.overview: Slay Queens is a bold, no-holds-barred documentary series that dives straight into the glitzy, gritty world of Mzansi's (South Africa's) most talked-about women.

series.name: The 1% Club Rollover
series.overview: Spin-off of The 1% Club, broadcsat over five nights. Lee Mack this special edition of the quiz in which the prize pot that is not won on one show is carried over to the next day's edition, meaning there could be up to £500,000 to be won. As usual, 100 contestants begin every show, but those who make it through to the final question return the next day to play the quiz again.

series.name: I Fucking Hate You
series.overview: A sitcom about friends who fucking hate each other

series.name: Cheap A$$ Beach Houses
series.overview: Big beach dreams meet small budgets as buyers search for affordable homes in the sand, chasing their slice of seaside paradise where the views are priceless without wiping out their wallets.

series.name: Clash of the Comics
series.overview: A wild and unpredictable event that sees some of the biggest names in comedy wrestling against each other and some of the UK's top professional wrestlers.

series.name: Jasmine Harman's Renovation in the Sun
series.original_name: Jasmine Harman's Renovation in the Sun
series.overview: Jasmine Harman’s no stranger to helping others find their perfect place in the sun. Now she and her family take the plunge and transform a run-down villa into their new home on the Costa del Sol.

series.name: Scroll Patrol
series.overview: Scroll Patrol is an inside look into the life of RuPaul's Drag Race Season 2 and All Stars 10 icon, Nicole Paige Brooks. Nicole is scrolling through her camera roll, sharing never-before-seen photos and stories from her 30-year drag career, her personal life, and her RuPaul's Drag Race journey.

series.name: Fading Summer
series.overview: Plot is unknown

series.name: Strawberry Vampire
series.overview: From the strawberry fields of Strawbania to the fluorescent halls of American middle school - meet Franny Fragaria, a young vampire trying to fit in America, which is awkward - because America is awkward.

series.name: The Office
series.overview: Hang with the bros

series.name: Skelly: Closet Cases
series.overview: An overworked designer’s life spirals into chaos when she discovers a wisecracking skeleton living in her closet—forcing her to confront her past, her career, and the skeletons she never wanted to face. A surreal, dark comedy animation about grief, mental health, and a whole lot of bones.

series.name: Sex, Money, Murder
series.overview: A riveting true crime series that chronicles some of the most shocking stories of murder, deceit and scandal hidden within the fabric of America’s most notorious strip clubs. Each episode uncovers the true accounts of jaw-dropping homicides within these sanctuaries of seduction.

series.name: Voltaic Blood
series.overview: Gabriel Báthory fights his vampire nature and alliances to protect his last heir and last opportunity at redemption.

series.name: Doctor Who Rebirth
series.overview: Doctor Who: Rebirth follows a newly regenerated Doctor whose unstable transformation leaves their memories fractured and the universe changed in unsettling ways. As they uncover the cause of a mysterious cosmic force known as The Rebirth Pulse, the Doctor travels across time and space confronting revived dangers, unexpected allies, and shifting realities. Faced with a universe on the edge, the Doctor must rediscover their identity and forge a new path to protect all of time.

series.name: Eric Jerome Dickey's Friends and Lovers
series.original_name: Eric Jerome Dickey's Friends and Lovers
series.overview: A romantic drama exploring how friendship, passion, and forgiveness collide. The story follows two best friends, Debra, a Type A doctor, and Shelby, a free-spirited rule breaker, as their lives intertwine with those of Leonard and Tyrese.

series.name: The Troops
series.overview: From war zones to royal duties – Scots’ battalions train, fight and serve. On duty and off, we follow the lives of jocks and officers, uncovering courage, sacrifice and humanity.

series.name: What's 'T' Got To Do With It?
series.original_name: What's 'T' Got To Do With It?
series.overview: A young transgender woman navigates the ups, downs, and hilarious realities of transitioning, identity, and self-acceptance, offering a comedic and heartfelt peek into the trials and triumphs of her daily life.

series.name: Extreme Bugs
series.overview: Camouflage, deception and deadly precision: insects arrive with surprising survival strategies and thus take their place in the animal world. From bomb-igniting beetles, web-throwing spiders to tricky antlions – worldwide, the insect world has developed amazing abilities to protect itself from attackers and obtain food.

series.name: Break from Apocalypse
series.overview: She forged husks, unleashed the dead-now the apocalypse turns on its maker.

series.name: Judge Me If You Can!
series.overview:
Welcome to Judge Me If You Can the show where comedians confidently judge a complete stranger using nothing but vibes. You could debate, overthink, and still end up WILDLY wrong. The stranger already knows all the answers; the panel tries their best. And every reveal is funnier and more unhinged  than the last.

CAN YOU JUDGE THE RIGHT ANSWER BEFORE THE PANEL?

series.name: Heist: Robbing the Bank of England
series.original_name: Heist: Robbing the Bank of England
series.overview: Heist: Robbing the Bank of England' documents the 1990 Bank of England bond heist which saw a theft of £ 292 million. Hosted my Marcel Theroux, this series will travel across the globe to tell this incredible true story which spanned several continents over three decades, leaving many unanswered questions…until now.

series.name: Aşkın Gücü
series.overview: The Power of Love

series.name: Mafaad Parast
series.overview:
Mafaad Parast follows the lives of two cousins whose contrasting natures shape a dramatic tale of love, betrayal, and destiny. Despite being raised under the same roof, Zara and Mehroo see the world through entirely different lenses.

Zara, gentle-hearted and selfless, was brought up by her aunt Alia, never suspecting the deep-rooted resentment Alia harbors toward her. While Zara offers nothing but affection, Alia’s hidden bitterness quietly brews into choices that will alter lives.

series.name: Rasmalai
series.overview: The Kohli family lives with everyday chaos and heartfelt dreams that always feel just out of reach. When an opportunity promises to fulfill their wish, excitement fills their home, but so does tension. As old memories resurface, hidden secrets and lies begin to shake their bond. Sometimes, the sweetest moments arrive with the most unexpected twists.

series.name: Echo Heritage
series.overview:
Sada Al Turath is a storytelling series that brings to life a rich tapestry of Arab and Amazigh folklore. The channel explores tales and legends from Morocco, Algeria, Tunisia, Egypt, the Levant, Yemen, and the Gulf, along with Amazigh stories from the Rif, Atlas, Souss, Kabyle, Chaoui, and other world cultures.

Through modern narrative techniques that preserve authenticity, the show revives oral heritage for a new generation. Each episode presents engaging, educational, and culturally grounded stories suitable for the whole family. Sada Al Turath invites viewers to discover forgotten treasures that reflect the values, wisdom, and moral lessons that shaped the identity of many communities.

series.name: The Engines of Nene Valley Shorts
series.original_name: The Engines of Nene Valley Shorts
series.overview: This short form mini series of shorts, follows the misadventures of Amelia, Abi, Thompson and the rest of the gang in their day to day antics at Nene Valley Railway.

series.name: Bigfoot Took Her
series.overview: Investigator of the unexplained Jessica Chobot, along with law enforcement official Robert Collier, take a fresh look at one of the most bizarre unsolved missing persons cases in modern history, the disappearance of teenager Theresa Bier.

series.name: 5-Star
series.overview: SPOTLIGHTING THE REAL-TIME TRANSFORMATIONS OF FOUR ELITE COLLEGE FRESHMAN FOOTBALL RECRUITS

series.name: Husk to Self
series.overview: In a world of beasts, the Reforger creates new lives and discarded husks—until the queen who built it becomes one herself.

series.name: MAFS UK Does Come Dine With Me
series.original_name: MAFS UK Does Come Dine With Me
series.overview: Some of the show’s favourite brides and grooms will be taking on Come Dine With Me in a week of programmes where they will compete against each other to win a £1,000 prize for charity.

series.name: Steam Train Diaries
series.overview: Paul 'Piglet' Middleton journeys across the picturesque North York Moors National Park onboard heritage steam engines, and discovers what it takes to keep the iconic North Yorkshire Moors line running.

series.name: THE PETRA Ultimate Series
series.overview:
A Group of 10 Greatest Documentary Films

The Petra film series is a comprehensive documentary that showcases the history of the region and the culture of the Nabateans, including their arts of architecture, sculpture, and water engineering, as well as their trade and currency. The series features artifacts from the Petra Museum and its churches and reveals the connection between the Nabatean script and the modern Arabic script. It also explores fascinating topics related to the Arabic language and the region's history.

do not forget that Petra is one of the New Seven Wonders of the World.

12 Episodes, Around 12 hours.  Duration: (Eps 1 - (56:26), Eps 2 - (57:43), Eps 3 - (56:30), Eps 4 - (57:55), Eps 5 - (54:58), Eps 6 - (57:09), Eps 7 - (54:35), Eps 8 - (58:09), Eps 9 - (57:53), Eps 10 - (54:50), Eps 11 - (57:11), Eps 12 - (56:26).

series.name: Jamie Durie's Future House
series.overview: Jamie Durie enlists top builders and innovators to construct the ultimate affordable Future House: eco-friendly, stunning designs, and built fast.

series.original_name: 千原キャスティング株式会社
series.overview: MC Chihara Junior! A battle for the right to appear in a commercial! Milk Boy VS Nanagari▼Beni Shoga VS Two Tribe▼Shizuru VS Yadan▼Kukki! Waraihan Nishida Ogiri Showdown

series.name: Zero Star: The Cam Ward Story
series.original_name: Zero Star: The Cam Ward Story
series.overview: Witness Cam Ward's unlikely rise from overlooked high school QB with one Division FCS offer to the NFL draft's no. 1 pick.

series.name: Battle For Giant Cake Season 1
series.overview: 20 objects join the show called Battle For Giant Cake.

series.name: Hebridean Baker - Nordic Islands
series.overview: Coinneach MacLeod explores the food traditions of the Nordic Islands.

series.name: Tote Kai Tora
series.overview: The successful series THEN AND NOW, loved on the internet by thousands of viewers and with millions of views, premieres on SKAI television on Wednesday, November 5 at 9:00 PM, with Elena Charalamboudi and Alexandros Tsouvelas in the leading roles and the creative team of 5 MINUTE MUM behind the cameras.

series.name: Nightmare: Resurrections
series.overview: Following the events of Nightmare the movie, Rick Rollins moves into a new house where he starts getting nightmares again.

series.name: Come Dine With Me Canada 2025
series.overview: This new adaptation of the long running, hit UK format is coming to Food Network in Canada. Over five days, five strangers each host a three course dinner party in their own home for the other guests.

series.name: Death Tally
series.overview:
Death Tally is a horror-focused web series where every episode breaks down a movie’s body count, exploring each death with style, humor, and respect for the craft of horror.

The show doesn’t just count kills — it analyzes them. It’s about the art of the death scene, the impact on the story, and the creativity behind the carnage.

series.name: It's Andrew!
series.overview: Andrew, a wide-eyed, joyful young rhinoceros bursting with creativity navigates life in the ever-surprising world of Hornsby Downs.

series.name: BK100年　大コント祭
series.overview: Celebrate BK's 100th anniversary with a comedy skit! Comedians will create and present skits based on popular NHK Osaka programs such as "Bakeke" and "Seikatsu Wara Hyakka." The hosts will be Kamaitachi.

series.name: Could be Worse
series.overview: Could be Worse is an ensemble comedy about three friends navigating the absurdity of everyday life in LA, trying to make it in entertainment.

series.name: Come Dine With Me: Teens
series.overview: In this youthful mouthful, five altogether different teenagers take on the challenge of hosting the best dinner party in Manchester, in a bid to bag the £1000 cash prize

series.name: Aah!
series.overview: Aah is a spine-tingling 36-episode supernatural thriller adapted from the acclaimed Tamil anthology novel by Suriya Rethnna. Each week a chilling story unfolds, weaving hauntings of love, betrayal and vengeance into a larger narrative that follows Aditya as he faces the terrifying legacy of his mother Devi, whose grip from beyond the grave refuses to fade. From cursed homes and eerie hospital wards to a family bistro steeped in secrets, Aah blurs the line between the living and the dead.

series.name: Cancer Detectives: Finding the Cures
series.overview: Three trailblazing scientists take on cancer, with their pioneering work changing peoples’ lives, right now

series.name: Celebrity Come Dine with Me
series.overview: Celebrity contestants host dinner parties as they compete to bag a £1000 cash prize for their chosen charity.

series.name: WOUNDS & WINGS
series.overview: “Wounds & Wings,” produced by Dayton Junior School in association with Jemo Art Studios, is a Ugandan drama series written and directed by award-winning filmmaker James Twino. The story follows Sarah, a resilient single mother, and her daughter Nina as they navigate poverty, corruption, and the dark secrets of Lutalo’s past. Across two seasons, their journey of education, justice, and family resilience unfolds in a gripping, emotional, and visually compelling narrative—showcasing Uganda’s emerging talent and cinematic growth.

series.name: Na lovu
series.overview: A fast-paced game show where contestants must compete against 'The Chasers,' the show's eccentric and pompous know-it-all characters, in a variety of questions in order to win money by answering more of them correctly than the Chasers.

series.name: The Most Embarrassing TV Moments
series.overview: Excruciating, hilarious and plain embarrassing TV clips.

series.name: INCOMING: the game
series.overview: the horrifying and suspense-filled world of a deadly survival game that pulls six teenagers from various backgrounds into a nightmare. After a humiliating incident at his high school reunion, Bright, a brilliant but financially struggling teen, is lured into an Instagram ad that promises an easy way to make money. What he doesn’t know is that this click will entrap him and his friends into a game with no rules, where survival becomes the ultimate goal. As the game starts to haunt them in their everyday lives, the teens must navigate challenges, betrayals, and deadly consequences while trying to uncover the mystery behind the sinister game.

series.name: The Kevin Show
series.overview: Have a question? Give us a call at +1 302-219-0080

series.name: Aircore Lagos 2099
series.overview:
In a future Lagos ruled by machines, oxygen is power — and Aircore controls it all.

When street hacker Tunde uncovers a secret that could expose the system’s corruption, he becomes the target of Captain Zubair, a cybernetic enforcer sworn to protect the Core.

As the city burns beneath neon skies, their battle could decide the fate of humanity’s last breath.

series.name: Nice man! - election
series.overview: The reality duo Knaldperlen and Dagger go on a road trip to experience what the municipalities are doing, and it will be anything but boring.

series.name: Camogie: Inside the Championship
series.overview: Camogie: Inside The Championship is a new two-part documentary series that takes viewers right to the heart of the Camogie world with the first episode airing on Thursday November 6 on RTÉ One and RTÉ Player. For the first time ever, cameras have been granted unprecedented access to the inner world of senior intercounty camogie, following the entire championship season from the very first puck of a sliotar in pre-season training to the fever pitch of the All-Ireland Final.

series.overview: Rocktowrin is a fantastic bangla TV Series.Hope that this series release this year.

series.name: The Body in the Locker
series.overview: When Amy, the CEO of a major charity, loses her father, she's shocked to discover he owned a mysterious storage locker with a deadly secret inside - the body of a woman. Was her father a murderer? Who was this woman?

series.name: Hermitcraft Season 11
series.overview: Hermitcraft is a whitelist-only Minecraft Server started in April 2012 by Generikb and currently administered by Xisumavoid. There have been multiple vanilla and modded series and the server is currently on its eleventh vanilla season. Its members, called Hermits, are popular Minecraft players who have been recognized by other Hermits and have been invited to join.

series.name: The Chase New Zealand
series.overview: The Chase is on Aotearoa! Four Kiwi contestants must pit their wits against the Chaser, a ruthless quiz genius determined to stop them winning the cash prize. Hosted by Paul Henry.

series.name: MDRJago: Bendies Rising
series.overview: DP must train Ahmed and Aquizy to rescue dogs from the Kingdom of Kumaria.

series.name: Tell Me Not to Love You
series.original_name: Tell Me Not to Love You
series.overview: Brie is the daughter of a servant who works for Teddy's family. She grew up living in the household with her mother and developed mutual feelings for the young master, Teddy. Once they came of age, Teddy began pursuing Brie passionately.

series.name: Secrets of Supercheap Shopping
series.overview: A behind-the-scenes look at how discount disruptors are leading the charge in the bargain revolution. How are they saving us money and bagging such good deals?

series.name: Kuttram purindhavan : The Guilty one
series.overview: The story follows Bhaskar (Pasupathy), a former government pharmacist whose attempt to help goes wrong when a child goes missing, plunging him into a complex case fraught with guilt, secrets, and moral ambiguity. Gowtham (Vidharth) is the investigating officer, while Esther (Lakshmi Priyaa Chandramouli) is the frantic mother of the missing child.[7][8]

series.name: Sunday Night Football: Reality Hot Seat
series.original_name: Sunday Night Football: Reality Hot Seat
series.overview: Sunday Night Football like you've never seen it before!; join your reality faves as they celebrate the drama that makes the NFL obsession-worthy.

series.name: Trialside Shorts
series.overview: Trialside Shorts is an anthology series that delivers powerful, emotional storytelling in short-form episodes.

series.name: The Evolution of ARC Raiders
series.overview: From six developers chatting in an apartment to the very first designs, gameplay mechanics, and ARC enemies, take a look under the hood at the early days of the game's development.

series.name: قصه های عمو رحمان
series.overview: The Stories of Uncle Rahman" narrates the life of Imam Hasan and Imam Hussain as children

series.name: コント・デ・ンガナ
series.overview: Long Coat Daddy, Nippon no Shachou, Cellulite Spa, and Kaeru-tei! A comedy skit show featuring four comedy duos/groups from the Kansai region!

series.name: Vanunu
series.overview: A documentary series about Israel's "Nuclear Spy" Mordechai Vanunu. From early life, through his work in the Negev Nuclear Research Center, his path to whistle-blowing and subsequent abduction, trial and imprisonment. Including testimonies from the journalists that saw everything unfold and former high ranking Israeli intelligence figures.

series.name: LGM - Let's get married.!
series.overview: A kind-hearted girl lavanya falls for her new colleague Yashwant, but her heart breaks when he’s drawn to renu until he learns that real beauty lies beyond appearances. A new love story begins.

series.name: Baai Tujhyapayi
series.overview: The series is set in 1990 in the fictional village of Vesaich Vadgaon, Maharashtra. It centers on Ahilya, a teenage girl who dreams of studying medicine and becoming a doctor. Her ambitions clash with the village’s orthodox customs and gender-based restrictions. When Ahilya attains puberty, she is forced to conceal it to avoid an early marriage, while continuing to challenge the social taboos that attempt to limit her education.

series.name: Bigfoot Navajo Nation
series.overview: The Navajo Nation is a hotbed of Bigfoot activity – but the Navajo rarely talk about it with outsiders.  Join Donovan Yazzie and William Jevning as they interview witnesses and reveal evidence of these dangerous creatures who lurk in the darkness and even in broad daylight on the reservation.
